en.name: Rekayasa Perangkat Lunak Lanjut
en.description: This course explains various advances in software engineering area. These are ranging from its development process lifecycle: Analysis, design & modeling construction, testing, release and maintenance: and also various important topics such as: privacy & security, large -scale software system, model-driven, quality
en.outcomes: Student are aware with advances (techniques, tools, approaches) in engineering a softwareStudent are able to learn, independently, further those advancesStudent are abble to apply the advances to a lab-scale software project
